text: Don't let the headlines fool you. They may have been ` ` spotted'' together at one point or another, but Harry never seriously dated the singer Natalie Imbruglia or the actress Emma Watson. He was, however, seen with the pop star Ellie Goulding at the 2016 Audi Polo Challenge, with eyewitnesses telling The Telegraph that the two ` ` spent a lot of time sitting together under blankets.'' During a 2016 interview with ` ` The Project TV,'' Goulding was asked whether she planned to have a baby with Harry anytime soon. A mortified Goulding said no and called her interviewers out for being ` ` naughty, naughty people.'' Harry has also been turned down for dates.
